titles.title: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the Texas Western College's 1966 NCAA Basketball Championship and recognizing the groundbreaking impact of the title game victory on diversity in sports and civil rights in the United States.

Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the Texas Western College's 1966 NCAA Basketball Championship and recognizing the groundbreaking impact of the title game victory on diversity in sports and civil rights in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Celebrates the 50th anniversary of the Texas Western College's 1966 NCAA Basketball Championship.
Recognizes the groundbreaking impact of such title game victory on diversity in sports and civil rights in the United States.
